verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>
To <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> to <S%H995>perceive<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H998>understanding;<s%>
To <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H7919>wisdom,<s%> <S%H6664>justice,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and <S%H4339>equity;<s%>
To <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>subtlety<s%> to the <S%H6612>simple,<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion.<s%>

A <S%H2450>wise<s%> man will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and will <S%H3254>increase<s%> <S%H3948>learning;<s%> and a man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> shall <S%H7069>attain<s%> unto wise counsels: <S%H8458><s%>
To <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> and the <S%H4426>interpretation;<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and their dark <S%H2420>sayings.<s%>
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> but <S%H191>fools<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of thy <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy mother: <S%H517><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall be an <S%H3880>ornament<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto thy <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H6060>chains<s%> about thy <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> thee, <S%H14>consent<s%> thou <S%H408>not.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1980>Come<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> us, let us lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> let us lurk <S%H6845>privily<s%> for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> without cause: <S%H2600><s%>
Let us swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> as the <S%H7585>grave;<s%> and <S%H8549>whole,<s%> as those that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the pit: <S%H953><s%>
We shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>substance,<s%> we shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with spoil: <S%H7998><s%>
Cast <S%H5307>in<s%> thy <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us; let us <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> purse: <S%H3599><s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thou in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them; <S%H4513>refrain<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from their <S%H4480>path:<s%> <S%H5410><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> in <S%H2600>vain<s%> the <S%H7568>net<s%> is <S%H2219>spread<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1167>bird.<s%> <S%H3671><s%>
And <S%H1992>they<s%> lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood;<s%> they lurk <S%H6845>privily<s%> for their own <S%H5315>lives.<s%>

So <S%H3651><s%> are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1215>gain;<s%> which taketh <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof.
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> <S%H7442>crieth<s%> <S%H2351>without;<s%> she <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the streets: <S%H7339><s%>

She <S%H7121>crieth<s%> in the <S%H7218>chief<s%> place of <S%H1993>concourse,<s%> in the <S%H6607>openings<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates:<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> she <S%H559>uttereth<s%> her <S%H561>words,<s%> saying,

How <S%H5704>long,<s%> <S%H4970><s%> ye simple <S%H6612>ones,<s%> will ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6612>simplicity?<s%> and the <S%H3887>scorners<s%> <S%H2530>delight<s%> in their <S%H3944>scorning,<s%> and <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge?<s%>
Turn <S%H7725><s%> you at my <S%H8433>reproof:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will pour <S%H5042>out<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> unto you, I will make <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> unto you.
Because <S%H3282><s%> I have <S%H7121>called,<s%> and ye <S%H3985>refused;<s%> I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and no <S%H369>man<s%> <S%H7181>regarded;<s%>
But ye have set at <S%H6544>naught<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of my reproof: <S%H8433><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at your <S%H343>calamity;<s%> I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>cometh;<s%>

When your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> as <S%H7722>desolation,<s%> and your <S%H343>destruction<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%> as a <S%H5492>whirlwind;<s%> when <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you.
Then <S%H227><s%> shall they call <S%H7121>upon<s%> me, but I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6030>answer;<s%> they shall seek me <S%H7836>early,<s%> but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> me:
For <S%H8478>that<s%> <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>
They <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of my <S%H6098>counsel:<s%> they <S%H5006>despised<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H8433>reproof.<s%>
Therefore shall they <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of their own <S%H1870>way,<s%> and be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with their own <S%H4480>devices.<s%> <S%H4156><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the turning <S%H4878>away<s%> of the <S%H6612>simple<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> them, and the <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> them.
But whoso <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> unto me shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely,<s%> and shall be <S%H7599>quiet<s%> from <S%H4480>fear<s%> <S%H6343><s%> of <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
